Digital Recruiting Manager | Virtual | Careers | PeopleScout
A Candidate didnâ€™t do well in the Interview. I still HIRED her.
Generally at the end of an interview, the interviewer will ask the interviewee if she or he has any questions.
She asked these 3 questions to HR Manager. It was pitiful to see her struggling to answer them.
1. What are the company's growth plan and strategy for the next 5 years?
2. Why should I work for your organization?
3. What are the weaknesses of the company and how do you see this position contributing to strengthening those weaknesses?
The HR Manager wasn't impressed but as the hiring manager I had the final say. I ended up hiring her and she did rock the boat but she helped the team and me as a leader to grow.
Interviewing numerous candidates over the years has taught me:
*Sometimes the best employees donâ€™t make good first impressions.
*Acing an interview and performing on a job are two different things.

Paradigm Technology is a strategic boutique consultancy with over 20 years of success. We deliver expertise in three practices: Analytics, Project Leadership, and Cloud.-Responsible for Talent Management, working closely with Talent Acquisition driving our Onboard and Orientation Program for all of our associates. -Identify development opportunities with employees, administer and drive the development and management of our  LMS/Learning Management System. (SkillSoft). -Research, assign and track all training. Build reporting metrics to present to leadership and managers.-Conduct employee reviews, document feedback and action plans, followed up with appropriate L&D plans. -Mitigate risk and manage through issue escalations by coordinating with appropriate account members and documenting accordingly-Provide Subject Matter Expertise on Paradigm, Account and Project related matters as appropriate -Manage all ongoing 30, 60, 90, annual review processes with our Associates. -Collaborate and align on Associates personal growth objectives; defining and managing quarterly training and developing curriculum.-Assist with driving Associate Reward and Recognition Program.-Corporate Recruitment and primary PEO/HR contact partnering with vendors to develop programs and initiatives that improve talent retention for direct and in-direct employees. -Responsible for New Hire Orientation HRIS,  Health Benefit explanation, distribution of benefit materials,  eVerify, timecards and internal announcements. -Provide advice to managers and supervisors regarding corrective action/PIP plans, personnel practices, policy, and employment laws.-Ensure compliance with all applicable laws and regulations to include FMLA, FLSA,  ADA and EEO guidelines.-Manage bench of consultants for reoccurring needs and update/maintain through the internal ATS.

August 27, 2012, Mike worked with Patricia in different groups

Having never used a recruiting agency for an IT job before, I was skeptical and apprehensive. Trish made all of my trepidation disappear with her easy-going and up-front nature. She does not withhold important details or the hidden "gotchas" that I would've expected. She is also very quick courteous with her replies (text, email, phone) and provides all of the relevant information. She gives you all of the ammunition that you need to help make an informed decision and is genuinely looking out for your best interests, not hers.

summary: As the Director of Talent Management at Paradigm Technology I serve as our Associateâ€™s primary performance manager and internal touch point for all ongoing support related matters.  Manage and guide all direct and indirect  hires through the Onboarding and Orientation Program.Provide Subject Matter Expertise on Paradigm, Account and Project related matters as appropriate.Assist in streamlining and oversight of associate performance as related to:-Quality of work product-Deliverables and Value Add contributions -Drive development and management of Learning Management System-Quality and Compliance of processes and standards-Professional Attitude, Cultural compatibility and Ethic-Effectiveness of team and management of corporate or account related communications-Facilitate Corporate Communications as applicableOver 15 years of Talent Management/Recruiting and Management ExperienceDedicated to continuous improvement, efficiency, communication, and team building Sourcing SpecialistExperienced in Headhunting | Executive Search Results DrivenQuality & Delivery FocusedStrong staffing, employee relations, assessment and problem resolution skills Able to successfully align strategies to the business need Proven ability to develop and deploy programs and processes and educate accordingly Committed to quality performance, consistent and ethical behaviors Self starter, transaction and detail conscious with decent organizational skills Excellent research and networking skillsDetail OrientatedPromotes Excellence in Customer ServiceSpecialties: Recruitment | Executive Search & Selection | Recruiting Research | Sourcing | Internet Recruiting | Recruiter Training | Sourcing Training |  Job Search & Strategy |  Client Delivery | Cloud Recruitment | Boolean Searching | Career Advice | Personal Branding
